__e: It's very difficult to find who will be punished and when in this list.
You are grounded, and you are not to leave this house under any circumstances.
They have to know we've been in contact with Ed and Al, because of the matter with the secretary, and yet, they're sending us off to the front, without the least bit of censure.
Bobby is the best man I've ever known, and your son is a monster who should be punished for what he did to me.
I can't let my dad be punished for something he didn't do no matter what a tool he is.
I know what I did to his body is wrong, and I should be punished for that, but... I didn't kill Charlie.
You don't hold with the old-fashioned idea that murder is a serious crime?
- God is punishing me and he is right.
And the gods have punished me by striking down my father.
Well, he'd better not be late, otherwise he's grounded, for life.
I wanted to tell you the truth, but my mom would have grounded me until the end of time.
Never mind that, I haven't executed anyone in a while!
Anyone who puts a curse on the royal family has to be punished by death.
You are the biggest fool any mother aver had.
